name: The Last Demon [Ludum Dare 33]
description:
[FULLSCREEN RECOMMENDED

"It's time we take it back." - Lucifer

disable the spawners

destroy your enemies

kill

kill...

------------------------------------------

(Z) ability is hellraise.
the longer you hold down Z the further the spell is cast

(W) ability is a short range area of effect damage spell

(C) ability spawns two minions that try their best to explode your foes

---------------------------------------------

deactivate all the stones to stop the spawner
then destroy the remaining enemies

maybe fight God at the end. If you can get there....]
